title: NBA Awards: Who did Jalen vote for?
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss tonight’s play-in games. The Nets are heavy favorites to beat the Cavaliers, but will this be a blowout or much closer than we think? Over in the West it’s Clippers vs. Timberwolves. Karl Anthony Towns has come a long way, but do they think he has the potential for superstar status? Also, find out who Jalen voted for in the NBA Awards. Is it Joker, Embiid, or Giannis for MVP? Did Jalen vote with his heart for Cade Cunningham or did he go with Evan Mobley? Plus, host of Mariah’s Untitled Basketball Show, Mariah Rose joins the show to talk about covering the WNBA draft last night. Find out what stood out the most for her on draft night. All that and more… 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
